title: Premiere: The RIVE Project – Open Road
body:
The collaborative brainchild of New Zealand singer / songwriter Christy Whelan and Israeli ambient guitarist Arli Liberman, **The RIVE Project’s** debut offering, _Open Road_, is anthemic indie pop at it’s absolute best.

Combining real hearts-on-sleeves, fists to the sky songwriting, with super slick, ambitious production, it manages to be simultaneously stadium ready whilst endearingly intimate – perfect for those summer playlists.

With their debut EP, **_Wanna Change_**, available in late September, alongside a London headline show at Sebright Arms set for 3 October, these next few months are set to be rather special for The RIVE Project. Open Road is out tomorrow (19 August) on their own label, Rive Records).

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
